# PHP/CheckIPv6

Check for IPv6 support.

## Result variables

* `HAVE_IPV6`

  Whether IPv6 support is supported and enabled.

## Basic usage

```cmake
# CMakeLists.txt
include(PHP/CheckIPv6)
```
